subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer survived three match points in the second set to defeat Andy Roddick Tuesday at the Tennis Masters Cup. For Roddick, just coming close to beating Federer can feel like an accomplishment.
snippet: Roger Federer survived three match points in the second set to defeat Andy Roddick Tuesday at the Tennis Masters Cup. For Roddick, just coming close to beating Federer can feel like an accomplishment.
